## LinearCardContainer.dealTotal() method

Deals up to the given total number of cards, divided between the given targets.

**Signature:**

```typescript
dealTotal(targets: ICardReceiver<TCard>[], totalCount: number, handLimit?: number, firstTargetIndex?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  targets | [ICardReceiver](./bge-core.icardreceiver.md)<!-- -->&lt;TCard&gt;\[\] | Recipients of the deal. |
|  totalCount | number | Maximum number of cards to deal in total. |
|  handLimit | number | _(Optional)_ |
|  firstTargetIndex | number | _(Optional)_ Index of the first recipient in <code>targets</code>. |

**Returns:**

void
